rows.label: tev001495_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0002
rows.name:
Bet you're thinking it's not like me to be found in a
place like this, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0003
rows.name:
I was about to buy Gwin some new goggles.
His old pair got smashed during a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0004
rows.name:
They weren't a big deal to him or anything,
but he works hard out there and never complains.
Thought I'd get him something to say thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001495_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what Gwin means to Irina.

rows.label: tev001495_JNK0020
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: tev001495_SEL0021
rows.name:
Suggest that Gwin would probably enjoy
training with Irina more than a pair of goggles.

rows.label: tev001495_JNK0030
rows.name: Implore

rows.label: tev001495_SEL0031
rows.name: Urge Irina to get Gwin something better than goggles.

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0005
rows.name:
Gwin? I dunno. He's just...Gwin, you know?
He's like a little brother, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0006
rows.name:
He was a pretty close friend to my actual little brother,
so it's possible I see a little bit of him in Gwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0007
rows.name:
I wish I'd been a better sister to my brother when he
was alive, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0008
rows.name:
Especially after I joined the military, I barely had any
time for him. We rarely talked at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0009
rows.name: I was never there to praise him. Or to scold him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0010
rows.name:
I think that's why when I see Gwin working hard,
I want to buy him something to show him my support.
You know? Like a big sister would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0011
rows.name: Well, I'd better get to it. See you on our next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0012
rows.name: Um, yeaaaaah. I'd really rather not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0013
rows.name:
I do try to teach him things from time to time,
but when I have to get strict, it gets kinda...odd.
The guy is way too into that kind of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0014
rows.name:
I actually thought he might have some sort of discipline
fetish or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0015
rows.name:
But everyone else seems to think he's totally normal.
For some reason, he's only that way with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0016
rows.name:
I don't know. Maybe it's just some little quirk I'm
making way too much out of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0017
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm just gonna buy him the goggles.
He deserves an actual present now and then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0018
rows.name:
I feel bad that I didn't get my real little brother more
presents when he was alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0019
rows.name:
I think that's why when I see Gwin working hard,
I want to buy him something to show him my support.
You know? Like a big sister would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0020
rows.name: Well, I'd better get to it. See you on our next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0021
rows.name: Huh? What are you talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0022
rows.name:
Right now, what Gwin needs is a replacement pair
of goggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0023
rows.name:
What would be the point of buying anything else?
Why would he even WANT anything else?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0024
rows.name:
If I were going to buy someone a big fancy present,
it would be the colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0025
rows.name: Oh, that's right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0026
rows.name:
I should probably get her a thank-you gift for the
next time she takes me on a mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0027
rows.name:
Yeah, that would be the perfect time.
I'm sure she'd happily accept it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0028
rows.name:
Ah, but if I'm gonna get her something nice,
I can't be wasting money on expensive goggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll just get Gwin one of those cheap plastic pairs that
people use in swimming pools and stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0030
rows.name: Thanks for the great idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001495_MSG0031
rows.name: I can't wait for our next mission together.[ST:wait ]
